resources.string: A quick and reliable solution for help in emergency situations
Customize how you activate the SOS alert by selecting a combination of volume and power buttons.
When triggered, the app will automatically start recording, enable GPS, and send alerts to your emergency contacts.
You can cancel an SOS alert within 5 seconds if triggered by mistake.
Please read and accept the following terms before using this app:

1. This app is an emergency assistance tool.

 2. Privacy and Data Usage: We only use your device's sensors (camera, microphone, GPS) during active emergencies. All data is stored securely on your device.

 3. No Data Collection: We do not collect or store any personal data outside of emergency situations. Your privacy is our priority.

 4. Emergency Contacts Only: Your data and location are only shared with your designated emergency contacts during an SOS situation.

 5. Service Limitations: While we strive for reliability, the app's functionality depends on device connectivity and battery. We cannot guarantee service in all situations.

 6. Sensor Usage: By accepting, you allow the app to access location, camera, and microphone ONLY during emergency situations.
